attributes.action: Twitter to stop Shadow Banning people where people think they are being ignored
attributes.additional_details: People on twitter have groups' they regularly make contact with and for some this is their only contact with people watching the same programmes where people actually make friends/associates. being thrown into "Coventry" by twitter is uncalled for and people should be made aware of this without the horrible feeling that your twitter friends are ignoring you without any explanation to let you know why/ what comment meaning that someone can do this for no other reason than disagreeing with you
attributes.background: Twitter is throwing people that rely on twitter to have some form of contact daily..Affecting people with Mental Health issues leaving them feeling isolated and ignored because Twitter put them on a Shadow Ban without warning and be detrimental to peoples well being. This people should be told about

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Twitter, not the UK Government or Parliament.
